import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./header.css" const Header = () => { /* Change Backgrorund Header */ window.addEventListener('scroll', function () { const header = document.querySelector('.header') if (this.scrollY >= 560) header.classList.add('scroll-header') else header.classList.remove('scroll-header') }) const [toggle, showMenu] = useState(false) const [activeNav, setActiveNav] = useState('#home') return (
Me
  • setActiveNav('#home')} className={activeNav === '#home' ? "nav__link active-link" : "nav__link"} > Home
  • setActiveNav('#about')} className={activeNav === '#about' ? "nav__link active-link" : "nav__link"} > About
  • setActiveNav('#skills')} className={activeNav === '#skills' ? "nav__link active-link" : "nav__link"} > Skills
  • setActiveNav('#my_experiences')} className={activeNav === '#my_experiences' ? "nav__link active-link" : "nav__link"} > Experiences
  • setActiveNav('#portfolio')} className={activeNav === '#portfolio' ? "nav__link active-link" : "nav__link"} > Portfolio
  • setActiveNav('#contact')} className={activeNav === '#contact' ? "nav__link active-link" : "nav__link"} > Contact
showMenu(!toggle)}>

) } export default Header
